sellerOvcId.description: The circuit identifier that the Partner/Access Provider (Seller) uses to refer to this OVC.

buyerOvcId.description: The circuit identifier that the Partner/Access Provider (Buyer) uses to refer to this OVC.

mtuSize.description: The maximum transmission unit size. An integer greater or equal to 1522.

colorFowardingEnabled.description: Identifies if the Buyer requests Color Forwarding for this service
